div.p: A debit relationship ties a financial transaction (target) to an account (source). A debit, once applied (posted), may have either a positive or negative effect on the account balance, depending on the type of account. An asset account debit will increase the account balance. A non-asset account debit will decrease the account balance.

valueString.value: Lock all vaue sets untouched since 2014-03-26 to trackingId 2014T1_2014_03_26

A non-asset account debit will decrease the account balance.
